event.title: BarRoom Preachers & C&S Rollin’ Smoke!
event.description: On June 22, we will have live music featuring BarRoom Preachers and delicious BBQ by C&S Rollin’ Smoke! Cheers!

event.title: Bryan Shayne and Texasiana Famous Food!
event.description: Next Friday!! Enjoy and dance to live music by the awesome Bryan Shayne 6-9p and grub on some delicious food by Texasiana 5-9p!! And of course, enjoy great craft beers 3-10p! Cheers!

event.title: June Jeep Meet
event.description: OlllllllO We love seeing those Jeeps! Next meet will be June 30th 2-6pm. Let’s talk Jeeps over cold craft beer! We also have wine, cider, & mimosas. Cheers!

event.title: Party before the 4th!
event.description: Many have asked when we will do another special week night opening so we decided on July 3rd since the next day is a holiday! Enjoy mid-week brews at Vallensons and get your growler fills for your holiday celebration! Food Truck is TBD. Cheers!

event.title: Stogies & Ales for Vets
event.description: The next Stogies and Ales for Veterans is this Friday! And it’s steak night!! Grab your cigars, your military brothers and sisters and enjoy great craft beer, a delicious C&S Rollin’ Smoke steak dinner, and live music by the awesome Bryan Shayne from 6-9pm! Cheers!

event.title: Paws and Pints
event.description: Join us at Vallensons for our first fundraiser to Help Us, Help Them, Wag Again. There will be great food from Home Saddled BBQ, amazing beer (of course) from the brewmaster himself Valle, live music, raffles, and of course, doggos!

event.title: July Jeep Meet
event.description: OlllllllO July Jeep Meet will be July 21st, 2-6pm. Food truck is TBD. Show us your Jeeps! Cheers!

event.title: Valle’s Bday Celebration/Two Fifths
event.description: Valle turns 45 on Aug 10!! Come celebrate with us! Live music by Two Fifths, delicious food by Home Saddled BBQ, and of course, Valle’s great craft beer! Cheers!
